title: Context
description: Location and market context. All fields optional. Platforms MAY geo-detect from request; provided fields MUST override.

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., 'US', 'CA'). Market context for product availability, pricing, and currency. Detected from request if omitted.

region.description: State, province, emirate, or district (e.g., 'CA', 'ON', 'Dubai'). Format varies by country.

postal_code.description: Postal or ZIP code for regional refinement. Not applicable in all countries.
